sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { View, Text, Image, ScrollView, TextInput} from 'react-native';

import css from "./Style"
import global from "../Global/Style"

export default function VerAssistido({navigation}){
    const [value, onChangeText] = React.useState('Useless Multiline Placeholder');

    return(
        <View style={global.body}>
            <Image style={css.image} source={require("../assets/logo.png")}/>
            <View style={{
                width: "100%",
                height: "20%",
                display: "flex",
                flexDirection: "row",
                alignItems: "center",
                justifyContent: "space-evenly"
                }}>
                <View style={css.fotoText}>
                    <Text>FOTO</Text>
                </View>
                <View style={css.fotoText}>
                    <Text>FOTO att</Text>
                </View>
            </View>
            <View style={css.scrollView}>
                <ScrollView>
                    <View style={css.info}>
                        <Text style={css.textInfo}>Nome:</Text>
                        <Text style={css.textInfo}>Info</Text>
                    </View>
                    <View style={css.info}>
                        <Text style={css.textInfo}>RG:</Text>
                        <Text style={css.textInfo}>Info</Text>
                    </View>
                    <View style={css.info}>
                        <Text style={css.textInfo}>CPF:</Text>
                        <Text style={css.textInfo}>Info</Text>
                    </View>
                    <View style={css.info}>
                        <Text style={css.textInfo}>Nascimento:</Text>
                        <Text style={css.textInfo}>Info</Text>
                    </View>
                    <View style={css.info}>
                        <Text style={css.textInfo}>Cargo:</Text>
                        <Text style={css.textInfo}>Info</Text>
                    </View>
                    <View style={css.info}>
                        <Text style={css.textInfo}>Sexo:</Text>
                        <Text style={css.textInfo}>Info</Text>
                    </View>
                    <View style={css.info}>
                        <Text style={css.textInfo}>Data admissão:</Text>
                        <Text style={css.textInfo}>Info</Text>
                    </View>
                    <View style={css.info}>
                        <Text style={css.textInfo}>Data demissão:</Text>
                        <Text style={css.textInfo}>Info</Text>
                    </View>
                    <Text style={{fontWeight: 'bold', fontSize:18, alignSelf: 'center'}}>Relatório</Text>
                    <TextInput multiline
                                numberOfLines={5}
                                maxLength={20000}
                                onChangeText={text => onChangeText(text)}
                                value={value}
                                style={{padding: 10, borderColor: "black", borderWidth: 2, borderRadius: 15}}></TextInput>
                </ScrollView>
            </View>
        </View>
    )
}
